name: Easy Enchilada Casserole
author: JEANNIED59
summary: A creamy, picante Tex-Mex enchilada casserole. Garnish with sour cream and black olives, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
4  cooked skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl combine the soup, chicken, sour cream and green onions
In another small bowl combine the salsa and green chile peppers and mix
Cover the bottom of the baking dish with 4 tortillas
Add 1/2 of the chicken mixture, 1/2 of the salsa mixture, and 1 1/2 cups of shredded cheese
Add another layer of 4 tortillas and top with the remaining 1 cup of cheese
Cover and bake in the preheated oven for 55 minutes
Uncover and bake for an additional 5 minutes, until the cheese is melted on top
Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting
